MooEditable.desc: Class for creating a WYSIWYG editor, for contentEditable-capable browsers.

MooEditable.UI.MenuList.desc: UI Class to create a menu list (select) element.

MooEditable.UI.ButtonOverlay.desc: UI Class to create a button element with a popup overlay.

MooEditable.Extras.desc: Extends MooEditable to include more (simple) toolbar buttons.

MooEditable.Group.desc: Extends MooEditable to have multiple instances on a page controlled by one toolbar.

MooEditable.Forecolor.desc: Extends MooEditable to change the color of the text from a list a predefined colors.

MooEditable.Table.desc: Extends MooEditable to insert table with manipulation options.

MooEditable.Image.desc: Extends MooEditable to insert image with manipulation options.

MooEditable.Charmap.desc: Extends MooEditable with a characters map
